name: Cloud Control (vurtual)
description:
You are a heavenly cloud that has lost it's angel. Better go look for here, eh? Dodge demons or zap them with your lightning on the was to rescuing your angel from falling into hell. I just ran out of time to create the end where you are reunited with the angel, and the second wave of devils is a bit weird still! However, it's still good fun, and I enjoyed making it, and I learned a lot about animation in Unity3D. I'll do fixes over the coming days.

*** UPDATED 31-12-2020 ***

Some bugs crushed, some improvements based on comments, especially with regard to visibility of your strike range. It's not perfect still, and I'll improve it further if there's any interest.

Forgot to add, there is now a secret way to kill the demons....

Attributations

Icons made by Darius Dan from www.flaticon.com
Icons made by iconixar from www.flaticon.com
Icons made by Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com
